name: Apparen
overview:
Apparen creates, sells and supports cloud applications for specialized purposes. Its portfolio includes:

TicketPeak - a full-function, ultra low-cost ticketing system for event organizers; BuyersVine - a wine selector kiosk system for wine retailers CoverDeal - a coupon management system for business who use daily deal firms; Scan-and-Match: A point of purchase tool that helps shoppers find complementary products
